mapper.select: select count(id) from cms_article where id in (select article_id from cms_category_article where category_id=#{categoryId}) and status=1 and deleted=0 limit 1
select id from cms_article where deleted=1 order by id ASC limit 500

select id,subject,message,digest,keyword,author,category_name as categoryname,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,top,status,allow_comment as allowcomment,views,cms_article.create_time as createtime,cms_article.modify_time as modifytime from cms_article where id=#{id} limit 1

select id,subject,author,category_name as categoryname,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,views,top,status,deleted,cms_article.create_time as createtime,cms_article.modify_time as modifytime from cms_article where deleted=0 and year(create_time)=year(#{create_time}) and month(create_time)=month(#{create_time}) order by create_time desc

select id,subject,author,category_name as categoryname,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,views,top,status,deleted,cms_article.create_time as createtime,cms_article.modify_time as modifytime from cms_article where deleted=0 order by create_time desc limit 0,10

select id,subject,author,category_name as categoryname,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,top,status,allow_comment as allowcomment,views,create_time as createtime,modify_time as modifytime from cms_article where id in (select article_id from cms_category_article where category_id=#{categoryId}) and status=1 and deleted=0 order by top desc

select id,subject,digest,author,category_name as categoryname,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,views,create_time as createtime,modify_time as modifytime,top,status from cms_article where id in (select article_id from cms_category_article where category_id=#{categoryId}) and status=1 and deleted=0 order by top desc
mapper.update: update cms_article set author=#{author},category_name=#{categoryName},subject=#{subject},message=#{message},digest=#{digest}, keyword=#{keyword},top=#{top},status=#{status},rate=#{rate},rate_times=#{rateTimes},deleted=#{deleted}, allow_comment=#{allowComment},modify_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cms_article where deleted = 1 limit 500
